Member Function Documentation

Image *& OpenCV::VideoIO::Capture::captureFrame (  )  [virtual]

Captures frame from video source.

Returns:
Pointer to captured Image. Image is alwais located in the same memory zone; you can use "captureFrame()" instead of "image = captureFrame()".

References m_capture, and m_capturedImage.
